Name: VariableReference
Description: A reference to a variable that describes the attribute.

Name: AttachmentValue
Description: The value of the attachment expressed as a string, if not a variable.

Name: AttachmentRegionReference
Description: Reference to the CoordinateRegion that defines the attachment point for the attribute.

Name: MeasureDefinitionReference
Description: Reference to the MeasureDefinition that the attribute is attached to.

Name: Value
Description: Reference to the specified Value of the MeasureDefinition that the attribute is attached to.

Name: AttachmentLevel
Description: Describes the attachment level of the attribute as Cube, CoordinateRegion, Dimension, Measurement, or MeasurementValue.
